Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog

Class CourseCatalog

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog.CourseCatalog
public class CourseCatalog
extends java.lang.Object
Maintains a list of Courses which can be added/removed from/to and can be loaded/saved from a file
Author:
Daniel Nolting, Ki Miller, Sean McKone

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CourseCatalog()
    Create a new CourseCatalog

    • CourseCatalog

      public CourseCatalog()
      Create a new CourseCatalog

  • Method Details

    • newCourseCatalog

      public void newCourseCatalog()
      Clear the existing catalog

    • loadCoursesFromFile

      public void loadCoursesFromFile​(java.lang.String filename)
      Load a list of courses into the catalog from a file
      Parameters:
      filename - name of the file to load from
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is an error reading the file

    • addCourseToCatalog

      public boolean addCourseToCatalog​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String section, int credits, java.lang.String instructorId, int enrollmentCap, java.lang.String meetingDays, int startTime, int endTime)
      Attempt to add a Course the catalog
      Parameters:
      name - the Course's name
      title - the Course's title
      section - the Course's section
      credits - the Course's credits
      instructorId - the Course's instructor id
      enrollmentCap - the enrollment cap of the Course
      meetingDays - the Course's meeting days
      startTime - the Course's starting time
      endTime - the Course's ending time
      Returns:
      false if the Course is a duplicate, true otherwise

    • removeCourseFromCatalog

      public boolean removeCourseFromCatalog​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String section)
      Attempt to remove a Course from the catalog
      Parameters:
      name - the Course's name
      section - the Course's section
      Returns:
      false if the Course is not in the catalog, true otherwise

    • getCourseFromCatalog

      public Course getCourseFromCatalog​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String section)
      Gets a Course from the catalog
      Parameters:
      name - the Course's name
      section - the Course's section
      Returns:
      the Course if it could be found in the catalog, null otherwise

    • getCourseCatalog

      public java.lang.String[][] getCourseCatalog()
      Get the full catalog of courses
      Returns:
      the CourseCatalog in the form of a 2d array; rows are courses and columns are course attributes. The attributes are the name, section, title, and meeting string of the course

    • saveCourseCatalog

      public void saveCourseCatalog​(java.lang.String filename)
      Save the current course catalog to a file
      Parameters:
      filename - the file to write to
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is an error when writing to the file
